      • findClosestStations

        public Station findClosestStations(Station searchStation,
                                   boolean take)
        Return the closest Station in which you could withdraw or park a bike
        Parameters:
        searchStation -
        take - if true, searches for a station in which you can withdraw a bike, else searches for a station in which you can park a bike
        Returns:
        the closest station respecting the take parameter
